name: Hanging L-Sit
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs together.
Engage your core and slowly raise your legs until they’re parallel to the floor, forming an ‘L’ shape with your hips at a 90-degree angle.
Keep your legs straight and toes pointed, maintaining tension in your abdominal muscles.
Hold the position, focusing on keeping your shoulders down and back, and your abs braced.
Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position under control.
